dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Pfft. What? What's so funny, um, about that? It's great news! Great news? Five more people, Alex. Five. That's your "great news"? Yeah, five more! That makes, like, eight total now. That's significant momentum for a brand new visa! Kazakhstan is putting itself on the map!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pfft. What? What's so funny, um, about that? It's great news! Great news? Five more people, Alex. Five. That's your great news? Yeah, five more! That makes, like, eight total now. That's significant momentum for a brand new visa! Kazakhstan is putting itself on the map!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Five more foreign citizens received the Neo Nomad Visa for tourists who combine work and leisure... Previously, three foreign tourists received the Neo Nomad Visa.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Momentum? Eight people, uh, in a country of what, 20 million? That's not momentum, that's a trickle. A really, really tiny trickle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Momentum? Eight people, uh, in a country of what, twenty million? That's not momentum, that's a trickle. A really, really tiny trickle.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The provided article does not contain information about the population of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: It's not about the sheer numbers yet, it's about the quality, right? These are remote workers, IT, finance, design! People with stable incomes, three thousand dollars a month! That's serious talent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not about the sheer numbers yet, it's about the quality, right? These are remote workers, I T, finance, design! People with stable incomes, three thousand dollars a month! That's serious talent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The visa is aimed at professionals in the fields of IT, marketing, finance, design, and consulting... To receive it, the applicant must confirm a stable income of $3000 per month

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Three thousand a month isn't exactly, you know, Silicon Valley money. And they're just looking for a cheaper cost of living, not necessarily for, like, the Kazakhstani experience itself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Three thousand a month isn't exactly, you know, Silicon Valley money. And they're just looking for a cheaper cost of living, not necessarily for, like, the Kazakhstani experience itself.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, come on! It's combining work with leisure, they want to be there, exploring, contributing. It diversifies the economy beyond oil, it's forward-thinking!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, come on! It's combining work with leisure, they want to be there, exploring, contributing. It diversifies the economy beyond oil, it's forward-thinking!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Neo Nomad Visa for tourists who combine work and leisure... The visa is aimed at professionals in the fields of IT, marketing, finance, design, and consulting, combining work with travel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Forward-thinking for who? For the people who can afford health insurance and prove they're not criminals? It's incredibly niche. And just a one-year visa? What's the long-term plan, um, for attracting anything significant?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Forward-thinking for who? For the people who can afford health insurance and prove they're not criminals? It's incredibly niche. And just a one-year visa? What's the long-term plan, um, for attracting anything significant?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Neo Nomad Visa gives foreign specialists the opportunity to live in Kazakhstan for up to one year... To receive it, the applicant must... obtain health insurance, and provide a certificate of no criminal record.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: It's a pilot, it's getting off the ground! You have to start somewhere, right? UK, US, Latvia, Singapore, South Korea! Global appeal!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a pilot, it's getting off the ground! You have to start somewhere, right? U K, U S, Latvia, Singapore, South Korea! Global appeal!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The recipients were three US citizens, one UK citizen, and one Latvian citizen... The first visa recipient was a UK citizen... Visas were also issued to citizens of South Korea and Singapore.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Global appeal with eight people. Please. It's a PR stunt, at best. Barely registers on the global nomad radar, I'd say.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Global appeal with eight people. Please. It's a P R stunt, at best. Barely registers on the global nomad radar, I'd say.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: That's just cynical, man! You're dismissing genuine innovation. This is how you build a new economy!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's just cynical, man! You're dismissing genuine innovation. This is how you build a new economy!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Innovation? Name one thing truly innovative about this, like, beyond "we gave eight people a temporary visa."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Innovation? Name one thing truly innovative about this, like, beyond we gave eight people a temporary visa.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: They're actively attracting a new demographic, they're… they’re adapting!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're actively attracting a new demographic, they're... they're adapting!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Adapting to what, a handful of remote workers? No, I'm not buying it. Not yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Adapting to what, a handful of remote workers? No, I'm not buying it. Not yet.
